Items from these collections may be inspected by prior arrangement with the Curator
column2: but potential clients should bear in mind that our viewing facilities are limited
column3: especially in the case of lantern slides and motion films.   It may be possible in some instances for reproductions (within the terms of the current copyright legislation) to be made at the client's expense
column4: and details of charges for this service can be found on our general Research Collections page.   Some paper-copy reproduction can be undertaken in-house
column5: but for other formats it will be necessary to enlist the services of a professional photographer.   Only in exceptional circumstances may any items be borrowed
